nodes.text: Imperial stormrifles, also known as stormtrooper riflemen, were specialized members of the Imperial Stormtrooper Corps. They wore a yellow pauldron over their right shoulder to distinguish themselves from other stormtroopers. They received special training in using rifles. Stormrifles were often deployed as part of fast attack operations in which heavy hitting powerful weapons, such as rifles, could be used to a tactical advantage. These troopers were a relatively rare sight off the battlefield, as although their rifles proved effective heavy hit effect in battle, they required support from regular troops and their clunky weapons proved ineffective when not engaging the correct enemies.
